## Checklist
- [ ] Branch named `feature/`, `fix/`, `chore/`, or `refactor/` + short slug
- [ ] `npm run build` passes locally
- [ ] No `console.log` / debug code left in
- [ ] PR is focused — one logical change per PR
- [ ] Linked issue or planning item (if applicable)
- [ ] No changes to shared contracts (manifest / permissions / session exchange), or impact documented above
